Talon:

"i never have seen something like that before" she said while she s=
at down"You are skilled, I know about Nightstrike... i heard that he is pre=
tty tought..." Talon fell in silence, she was nervous, has she finally been=
 discovered where she was? She needed to speak with Lord Perseus


From: Sa=
ndy 
Sent: Wednesday, January 13, 2010 10:41 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
Tucson falls to=
 the ground, and sits up against a wall. Lamia's attacks did take a slight =
toll on him. 

" Wow, I'd definitely would not recommend that anyone tries =
this at home. I'm - all right, I think. My neck and my foot will need some =
repair work, other than that.. Ughhh, oh yeah, theres this venom that Lamia=
 got me with... I- managed to neutralize the greater effects although, I do=
n't think I got all of it. But - for now, danger averted."

He tries to dir=
ect an ear toward Talon.

"Talon, thank you for putting up with me. I know =
it's not easy working with a bot who thinks outside the box."

He sends a m=
essage back to Lord Perseus.

"Lord Perseus, I'm pleased to inform you that=
 although one minion has escaped we have managed to capture Nightstrike and=
 will be bringing him aboard for questioning. I'd like permission to questi=
on him personally."
